messages.subject: Itou-san's women
messages.msgSnippet: We have the name of one of Itou Kashitaro s women in Kyoto--Tsuji Masa, and I was sure Tama gave me the name of his favorite Tayuu (which I can t find) but I
messages.messageBody:
We have the name of one of Itou Kashitaro's women in Kyoto--Tsuji Masa,
and I was sure Tama gave me the name of his favorite Tayuu (which I
can't find) but I wonder if any our friends who can read Japanese have
come across the name of the other mistress, the mother of his son.

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://barbarasheridan.blogspot.com/
